texts.biography: Nova lived in Tatalia since a very young age, and she was found for darkness power, which cannot be dominated by witches, since she was eight years old. She believed her power is from a magnificent family and she applies herself to find the consequece. She is called 'Night' by many people because of her lingering dark power.
texts.name: Nova Night

specialty.description: Increases the Attack and Defence of any Reapers and Grim Reapers for each level attained after 6th level.
specialty.name: Reapers
